locales.plugin_description: Provides private messages and a wide variety of shout-outs.
locales.slash_pm_description: Sends a private message to login or PlayerId
locales.slash_pma_description: Sends a private message to player and admins
locales.slash_pmlog_description: Displays log of your recent private messages
locales.slash_hi_description: Sends a Hi message to everyone
locales.slash_bye_description: Sends a Bye message to everyone
locales.slash_thx_description: Sends a Thanks message to everyone
locales.slash_lol_description: Sends a Lol message to everyone
locales.slash_lool_description: Sends a Lool message to everyone
locales.slash_brb_description: Sends a Be Right Back message to everyone
locales.slash_afk_description: Sends an Away From Keyboard message to everyone
locales.slash_gg_description: Sends a Good Game message to everyone
locales.slash_gr_description: Sends a Good Race message to everyone
locales.slash_n1_description: Sends a Nice One message to everyone
locales.slash_bgm_description: Sends a Bad Game message to everyone
locales.slash_dammit_description: Sends a Dammit message to everyone
locales.slash_ragequit_description: Gets you away from this server in rage!
locales.pm_info: Forgot what someone pm-ed you? Use "/pmlog" to check your PM history!
locales.bootme: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}$z$s{#message} chooses to boot back to the real world.
locales.bootme_dialog: {#message}Thanks for playing, please come back soon!
locales.ragequit_dialog: {#message}Thanks for playing, please come back soon!
locales.no_admin: {#server}» {#error}You have to be in admin list to do that!
locales.muted: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}{#error} disabled because you are on the global mute list!
